entry.title: Superhuman Sunshine (And Gotham's Dark Knight)
entry.summary:
Author: Coffee_Cats_Pomegranates

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,050Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Duty and desire don't mix.Batman is more than concerned about the oddly tranquil state of Gotham, he's never seen his city so quiet.That is, until Superman shows up with an explanation and a plea for assistance.Stubbornly clinging to lingering suspicion, Bruce finds himself working with Metropolis's Golden Boy to stop something that they find to be much bigger than they ever could have predicted.As they work together, Batman has to set aside his distrust, and with the rare opportunity of working in such close proximity, Batman finds that he enjoys Superman's presence much more than he thought he ever would.If he were anybody else.If they were anybody else.But duty and desire don't mix.Can they work through their weirdly heavy baggage?Can they set aside their character flaws?With so much at stake, will they ever risk taking the first step towards the other?Spoiler alert, they'll definitely try.

entry.title: Why doesn’t he want me, man?
entry.summary:
Author: BeelzebubsBois

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,875Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 28

Summary: After another fight between the dark knight and his son, during a particularly stressful night of patrol, Damian runs away to Dick’s house to ask for help. Long term help.Damian, Dick, and Wally learn to navigate life as a family with the help of Wally’s dads, Dick’s siblings, and a lot of trial and even more errors.But they never give up on the life they know they can build for themselves.

entry.title: Friendship(?)
entry.summary:
Author: mustangisinflames

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,583Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 22

Summary: “You were beginning to look overwhelmed there. Are you alright?”Clark breathed in the warm spice of patchouli and sweetness of lavender, “I'm fine. Just- it's a lot.”“Do you always find these events difficult? It's not the first time I've seen you at one.”Clark looked at him, surprised. It must've been clear on his face as Wayne smirked, “I notice things sometimes. I promise I am just as airheaded as they'd have you believe, but I remember faces, especially pretty ones.” Bruce seems to want a friendship, Clark can't believe his luck.

entry.title: The List
entry.summary:
Author: Butterfly_Wordsmith

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,258Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 183

Summary: Batman really thought he was doing the right thing when he came up with The List, a written document for each member of the Justice League to pre-approve a list of people to have sex with should they ever be under the influence of sex-pollen or any similar circumstance which would put them in a fuck or die situation.He just never expected to be on so many people's lists. Nor did he expect to be called upon so often- or to have so many feelings about it.Or to fall in love in the process.Neither did Clark, who wants more than just a turn to be saved by Batman's sexual availability- something so obvious to the rest of the League it's almost painful. entry.title: Learn to Fall in Love Again (With Yourself, Before Me)
entry.summary:
Author: ramblingsofamadnb

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,102Chapters: 7/9Kudos: 280

Summary: Until Bruce Wayne walked into the offices of The Daily Planet, Clark hadn’t known they’d been bought out. Now, the man Clark has held a deep-seated crush on for well over a decade owns the paper he works for.Clark would have never thought that could lead anywhere but disaster. He’s had enough failed relationships to know he’s hardly a catch anymore. He’s already resigned himself to lusting over his boss in silence for the rest of his life.But maybe Bruce can show him otherwise.(In other words, Clark and Bruce meet when Bruce buys the Planet. Clark assumes he's too fat for Bruce Wayne. Bruce has other thoughts.)There are fat characters in this. Don't like, don't read. I'm not interested in fatphobia.

entry.title: Family of the Year...Because No One Else Entered the Contest
entry.summary:
Author: Eboni_A

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 103,290Chapters: 18/18Kudos: 416

Summary: Clark Kent and Bruce Wayne are officially married and the adoptive parents of five very active teenagers: Conner, 16, new to families and basic human interaction; Robin, 15, on his way to the Olympic Trials for the US Men’s Gymnastics Team; Jason, 14, a child star about to take on the biggest movie role of his career; Tim, 13, training to be more than a back-up hero; and Damian, 12, ready to step into his father’s work boots and cowl.With their time divided between Gotham and New York City, Clark and Bruce struggle to remain a sane, united front while drowning in the chaotic drama that is teenagers left to their own devices when Jason’s birth mother wants to become a permanent fixture in his life, Robin’s behavior becomes erratic after a celebration turns tragic, Tim fears the feelings he has for Conner, Conner doubts his acceptance into the family, and Talia Al Ghul threatens to visit.For some unions, love just isn’t enough to keep it all together. It’s Clark and Bruce against the world, but can they succeed, when it seems that even their own children are on the opposing side?

entry.title: Make It Wayne
entry.summary:
Author: waynewolfling

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,981Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 173

Summary: Gotham’s most infamous billionaire playboy, Bruce Wayne, has spent years building a reputation—just not a good one. Between scandalous headlines, a trail of ex-lovers, and his ridiculous reality TV show, Make It Wayne, no one takes him too seriously. And that’s exactly how he likes it.But when life introduces him to one encounter after another with a painfully charming journalist, Bruce starts to wonder if he’s finally losing control of the carefully crafted mess that is his life.(Or: Bruce Wayne is a disaster, Clark Kent supposedly has his life together, and somehow, feelings start getting involved. entry.title: In Spite of All the Danger
entry.summary:
Author: crazyredd

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,190Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 91

Summary: Clark’s heart sank as he looked towards Bruce. They’d had this restaurant reservation for weeks now and it feels like they rarely have any time when they’re both free.“I’ve just been called into work. Perry specifically requested me,” Clark sighed heavily as he lied.Bruce couldn’t hide the disappointment on his face.But before he could say anything he looked up at Clark and saw a beam of light out the window past his shoulder. The Bat-Signal.

entry.title: the abyss gazes also
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,481Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 83

Summary: The gun fires twice. Blood and pearls fill the alleyway. The boy comes to a resolution. Years later in the mountains of Nepal, while honing his skills beneath the exacting gaze of Ra’s al Ghul, the boy comes to a crossroads.He makes his choice.The Batman never comes to be. The more things change, the more they stay the same.
